title: The Pixel 1 XL camera after updating to 10 Android was just awful to take photos.
content: Terrible "noises", as well as blurring, are simply impossible to endure.  I tried to reset to factory settings twice - this did not help.  I know that so many have encountered such a problem in 10 Android.  How can I roll back to version 9, and will it be fixed?  Considering that in December there will be the last update for the original pixel - I get scared
